title: Litvak Sentenced to 2 Years in Insider Trading Case (Audio)
itunes:title: Litvak Sentenced to 2 Years in Insider Trading Case (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- David Bissinger, a partner at Bissinger, Oshman & Williams, discusses the insider trading trial for former Jeffries trader Jesse Litvak, who was sentenced to two years in prison for lying to a customer about bond prices. He speaks with June Grasso and Greg Stohr on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
